      • isFakeID

        boolean isFakeID(int entityID)
        Check if the entity ID given belongs to a fake entity that has been created by this API.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to check
        Returns:
        whether or not it is a fake entity

      • getFakeByID

        FakeEntity getFakeByID(int entityID)
        Get a fake entity by its entity ID.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to retrieve
        Returns:
        the fake entity object, or null if the ID does not belong to a fake entity created by this API.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible(org.bukkit.Location location,
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player target,
                  double err)
        Checks whether or not an entity at the given location would be visible to a player, based on the server's entity render distance settings.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the entity
        target - the player who is viewing the entity
        err - the multiplier to multiply the max distance by before performing the calculation, use this to ensure a value is obtained even if the server is lagging slightly
        Returns:
        whether or not the player would be able to see an entity at that location

      • getVisible

        Stream<EntityIdentifier> getVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player viewer,
                                    double err,
                                    boolean fake)
        Get a stream representing all of the entities that the given player can see.
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player who is viewing the entities
        err - the error factor to include in distance calculations. Should be 1 ~ 1.03.
        fake - whether or not to include fake entities
        Returns:
        the stream of entity identifiers

      • getViewers

        Stream<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getViewers(EntityIdentifier object,
                                            double err)
        Get a stream representing all of the players that can see a given entity.
        Parameters:
        object - the entity to calculate for
        err - the error factor to include in distance calculations. Should be 1 ~ 1.03.
        Returns:
        the stream of players

      • getPacketFactory

        EntityPacketFactory getPacketFactory()
        Gets the packet factory for this instance of the API.
        Returns:
        the packet factory

      • dispatchPacket

        void dispatchPacket(EntityPacket packet,
                    org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Sends a packet to the specified player or as the specified player.
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet to send
        target - the player to send it to

      • dispatchPacket

        void dispatchPacket(EntityPacket packet,
                    org.bukkit.entity.Player target,
                    int delay)
        Sends a packet to the specified player or as the specified player at a specified delay.
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet to send
        target - the player to send it to
        delay - the number of ticks to wait
